titles.title: Saving Families First Alternative Minimum Tax Relief Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow personal exemptions under the individual alternative minimum tax, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/23/2007--Introduced. Saving Families First Alternative Minimum Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) the tax deduction for personal exemptions in determining the alternative minimum taxable income of individual taxpayers; and (2) an inflation adjustment for alternative minimum tax exemption and phaseout amounts for individual taxpayers beginning after 2007.
